title: Fun flash game you gotta play
content:
[url=http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/259936]www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/259936[/url]
this game is crazy and fun but it really gets hard on later levels. The game is basicly like asteroids but if it had add. I've only got up to level 21. See if you can beat me [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: Fun flash game you gotta play
content:
This kind of games bore me really quick. But it's pretty good for a flash game.-----------------

title: Re: Fun flash game you gotta play
content: Hey, it's pretty good actully! The enemy AI is better than in those games usually and the tracks missiles and stuff leaves looks good.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]
